snippet.title: CounterAttack: Uprising Trailer
snippet.description:
CounterAttack: Uprising is available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and Steam (Windows, Linux, Mac)!

Online co-op SHMUP with deep customization and cross-platform play! Team up or fight solo, 1 - 4 player local or up to 8 players online coop, unlock upgrades, use powerful ultimate abilities, enhance your ship the way you want, and save the Earth from annihilation.

https://CounterAttackUprising.com/

Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/counterattack-uprising-switch/

Xbox One
https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/counterattack/9nd0qv2nqrm0?cid=CounterAttackUprising

Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/451600/CounterAttack/
